description: This file defines three ViewModel classes (`ContactsViewModel`, `DealsViewModel`, `TasksViewModel`) for managing UI-related data in an Android application using the MVVM pattern. Each ViewModel interacts with use cases to fetch lists of contacts, deals, and tasks, respectively, and exposes these as StateFlows to be observed by the UI.

classes.name: ContactsViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel handling contact data, retrieves contacts via GetContactsUseCase, exposes as StateFlow.

classes.name: DealsViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel handling deal data, retrieves deals via GetDealsUseCase, exposes as StateFlow.

classes.name: TasksViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel handling task data, retrieves tasks via GetTasksUseCase, exposes as StateFlow.

methods.name: <constructor>
methods.description: Initializes the ViewModels with application context and sets up the data streams from respective use cases.
